channel.title: CGC-Senior Tech Interview on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in CGC-Senior Tech Interview on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Adapt to working with someone despite your differences
item.description: Q: We must often work as a team to get a task done and sometimes the members of that team differ from us in temperament or in the way they work. Tell us about a recent experience in which you were part of team and had to adapt to working with someone despite your differences.

item.title: Elicit Comments
item.description: It is important to be receptive to others' ideas and opinions. Tell us about a time when you had to elicit comments or feedback from another team member on an important issue.
